select COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE, COMMUNITY_POST.MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT, (select count(*) from POST_COMMENT WHERE POST_NUMBER = COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER) as cmt_cnt from COMMUNITY_POST join POST_COMMENT on POST_COMMENT.POST_NUMBER = COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER where COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_NUMBER = 'C05' GROUP BY COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_TITLE , COMMUNITY_POST.MEMBER_ID, COMMUNITY_POST.COMMUNITY_DATE, COMMUNITY_POST.VIEW_COUNT
ORDER BY COMMUNITY_POST.POST_NUMBER LIMIT #{pageBegin}, #{pageScale}
